Message:
I’d never once succeeded
in taming my power,
and I might just fail again.

But, my teacher told me...
to believe in myself.

A small tornado descended
onto the village,
taking only the humans
as it blustered off.

Didn’t I tell you?
You can do anything
you set your mind to,
Potpourri.

Thinking I heard her voice,
I turned, but no one was there.

She just lay quietly,
growing colder by the second.

If only I had acted quicker...
she could still be
alive right now...!

But I know...
I can’t just wallow
in my tears forever.

If I did that,
she’d only worry more...
and be unable to rest.

“Thank you,
for always having faith in me...

Because of you,
I’m now able
to believe in myself.”

I’m still weak, and I’m sure
there’ll be times
when I falter again.

But, I hope you’ll continue
to watch over me
so I can keep my chin up,
